text.section: There is a Maryland Innovation Initiative Fund.
The purpose of the Fund is to provide funding for the purposes described in § 10-456 of this part.
The Corporation shall administer the Fund.

Money in the Fund may be used only to:
award grants to promote the commercialization of research in accordance with the terms of this part; and
pay the costs necessary to administer the Initiative.

section.section: The Fund is a special, nonlapsing fund that is not subject to § 7-302 of the State Finance and Procurement Article.
The State Treasurer shall hold the Fund separately, and the Comptroller shall account for the Fund.
The State Treasurer shall invest the money in the Fund in the same manner as other State money may be invested.
Any investment earnings of the Fund shall be credited to the Fund.
